definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Trinity General Insurance Company Limited reserves the final right of approval.
sentences.chinese: 三聯保險有限公司保留保單的最後批覈權。

sentences.english: Gambling shavings inadvertently found that the beneficiary on SunQiMing policy turned out to be yourself.
sentences.chinese: 奕茹無意中發現，孫啓鳴保單上的受益人竟然是自己。

sentences.english: A Master policy covering different subject-matters insured of the same legal person.
sentences.chinese: 對於涵蓋同一法人的不同保險標的的統括保單。

sentences.english: In order to make profit, Insurance Brokerage Company must expand quickly.
sentences.chinese: 而保險經紀公司，主要靠提取期交保單續期佣金。

sentences.english: This clock carries a full-year guarantee.
This policy covers fire and theft.
sentences.chinese: 保單保了火災和盜竊險。

sentences.english: An All Risks policy covers every sort of hazard.
sentences.chinese: 一份綜合險保單保所有的險。

sentences.english: Please fill in the application form。
Fortunately, the typical property insurance policy provides some protection for you.
sentences.chinese: 幸運的是，一些典型的財產保單爲你提供了一些保護。

sentences.english: Policy effective date subject to underwriting acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 保單生效日期須經覈保審批。

sentences.english: Do you have a life insurance policy or retirement plan?
sentences.chinese: 你有沒有壽險保單或是退休計劃？

sentences.english: Only applicable to surrender with the policy lost.
sentences.chinese: 只適用於退保時已遺失保單。

sentences.english: Once the investment account is exhausted, the policy shall be terminated.
sentences.chinese: 當投資賬戶內無結存金額，本保單即告終止。

sentences.english: No. of persons are determined as of Policy Effective Date.
sentences.chinese: 人數以保單生效日期當日計算。

sentences.english: Joint life insurance is a type of contract that involves two or more than two insurants.
sentences.chinese: 連生保險，即一張保單以多個生命體爲承保對象。

sentences.english: Any changes should be initialed by New Policyholder.
sentences.chinese: 任何答案如有更改，敬請新保單持有人在旁簽署。

definition: life insurance/abbr. for 人壽保險|人寿保险
to settle a claim/claims settlement/payment of claims
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
